name: Time Agent Bamboo
description:
Enter the time zombies' home dimension and finish your mission of eliminating all time zombies. Your special gear allows you to exist outside of time as long as you have ammo in your weapon. While outside of time, your lasers and the zombies will not move, but as soon as you use up all of your ammo and time resumes, they will being moving. Now go get 'em!

Controls: 

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Shoot: Left Click or Space Bar

Restart: 'r'
